attributes.action: take  rapid action to resolve the postal dispute so avioding an extremely damaging effect on Uk small businesses
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
The postal dispute is having a serious negative effect on small & medium sized businesses. In the run up to Christmas distribution contracts cancelled by Royal Mail & disrupted mail delivery services will have a dramatic effect on UK business-threatening some & damaging profitability in others.
Immediate intervention is required by the Government to resolve this dispute so avioding an extremely damaging effect on UK small businesses & central Government tax revenues.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
